Class Sim

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--java.applet.Applet
                          |
                          +--Sim
public final class Sim
extends java.applet.Applet

Sim.java main class for simulation. controls switching card panels. holds pointers to all display components. controls switching algorithms. contains components that dont require overriding: font panel, and debug panel.

Since:
JDK1.1.7A
Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan
See Also:
Serialized Form
